text: @ewarren but the Dems criticized shutting travel from China & would have cost 300000 more lives.  Why dont u admit that? u failed to mention that ur 86 year old brother who passed away had CANCER & PNEUMONIA as well as coronavirus.  Don't u hate that the truth destroys ur narrative?
